A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am giving this movie no stars\, it is an absolute ABOMINATION. There is nothing good about this film\, not the story\, the acting\, the special effects\, editing\, directing\, ZERO. It is not because I wanted to see the same ole same ole\, I wanted something original. This\, was just pure GARBAGE. It wasn’t just a bad Star Wars movie\, it was a HORRENDOUS MOVIE PERIOD!!
